channel.title: BFC Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Digital Smorgasbord Of Skate, Surf, Snow, Music, Industry and Jesus Related Information
channel.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast is a weekly show containing upcoming music, information about Boarders For Christ related events, interviews with pro riders and industry buffs and a bible study to feed your soul.
channel.description: The weekly connection to the skate, snow and surf culture as well as Boarders For Christ

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.1 Featuring Manafest
item.itunes:summary: This week we talk about collaborations, bikecar, and myspace. Featuring music from Manafest and a bible study from 2 Timothy 4:12. Check it out!
item.summary: This week we talk about collaborations, bikecar, and myspace. Featuring music from Manafest and a bible study from 2 Timothy 4:12. Check it out!
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, bikecar, manafest, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.2 Featuring Brightwood
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss "The Red Project", The Business of Skateboarding and Skateboard Pro Comebacks. Featuring music from Brightwood and a bible study from Philippians 1:20.
item.summary: This week we discuss "The Red Project", The Business of Skateboarding and Skateboard Pro Comebacks. Featuring music from Brightwood and a bible study from Philippians 1:20.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, Bono, Red, brightwood, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.3 Featuring Olivia The Band
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss industry haps, the 'es' game of skate, the importance of community and the new film "Jesus Camp". Featuring music from Olivia The Band and a bible study from Matthew 6:25-34.
item.summary: This week we discuss industry haps, the 'es' game of skate, the importance of community and the new film "Jesus Camp". Featuring music from Olivia The Band and a bible study from Matthew 6:25-34.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, olivia, jesus camp, community, jesus

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 4
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.4 Featuring Future Of Forestry
item.itunes:summary: Special Edition feturing live interviews with Professional Skateboarders Richard Mulder, Jud Heald and Jared Lee. Featuring music from Future Of Forestry.
item.summary: Special Edition feturing live interviews with Professional Skateboarders Richard Mulder, Jud Heald and Jared Lee. Featuring music from Future Of Forestry.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, future of forestry, jared lee, jud heald, richard mulder, something like silas, jesus

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.5 Featuring Man Of War
item.itunes:summary: This week we interview Man Of War in our studio, discuss internet addiction and the new Burton film "For Right Or Wrong". Featuring music from Man Of War and a bible study from Philippians 1.
item.summary: This week we interview Man Of War in our studio, discuss internet addiction and the new Burton film "For Right Or Wrong". Featuring music from Man Of War and a bible study from Philippians 1.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, man of war, jesus

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.6 Featuring Matt Ridenour
item.itunes:summary: This week we interview Mark Fitzgerald from Spy Optics, discuss living your faith out and getting involved in the business aspect of the industry. Featuring music from Matt Ridenour and a bible study from Psalm 119:143.
item.summary: This week we interview Mark Fitzgerald from Spy Optics, discuss living your faith out and getting involved in the business aspect of the industry. Featuring music from Matt Ridenour and a bible study from Psalm 119:143.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, spy, spy optics, optics, matt ridenour, jesus

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 7
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.7 Featuring Derek Webb
item.itunes:summary: Short podcast featuring the new, FREE, album from Derek Webb
item.summary: Short podcast featuring the new, FREE, album from Derek Webb
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, Derek Webb, Thanksgiving, Christmas, jesus

item.title: BFC Podcast Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Boarders For Christ
item.itunes:subtitle: BFC Podcast Vol.8 Featuring Othello
item.itunes:summary: We discuss what we did over Thanksgiving and what BFC is doing with the Salvation Army. We sit down with hip hop artist Othello and a bible study from Jeremiah 1.
item.summary: We discuss what we did over Thanksgiving and what BFC is doing with the Salvation Army. We sit down with hip hop artist Othello and a bible study from Jeremiah 1.
item.itunes:keywords: skateboard, music, hiphop, christian, bible, streetwear, boarders for christ, talk, surf, snow, skate, Othello, Light headed, Thanksgiving, Christmas, jesus
